title: User Sign-Up with Valid Details
description: Verify that a new user can sign up successfully using valid credentials via Clerk authentication system.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-up page.
Enter valid email and password.
Submit the sign-up form.
Confirm that the user account is created and user is redirected to the main dashboard.

title: User Sign-In with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that an existing user can sign in successfully using correct credentials via Clerk authentication system.

steps.description: Navigate to the sign-in page.
Input registered email and password.
Submit the sign-in form.
Verify successful user authentication and redirection to the main dashboard.

title: User Session Management and Auto Logout
description: Ensure user session persists correctly and auto logs out after inactivity or logout request.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user.
Remain idle until session timeout period.
Confirm that the user is automatically logged out after timeout.
Log in again and manually trigger logout.
Verify the session is terminated and user is redirected to the sign-in page.

title: Create New Task with Basic Details
description: Verify that user can create a task with title, description, priority, and due date.

steps.description: Navigate to task creation interface.
Enter valid task title, description, priority level, and due date.
Submit the new task.
Confirm that the task appears in the task list and kanban board with correct details.

title: Edit Existing Task and Update Details
description: Verify that user can edit a task's title, priority, completion status, and recurrence settings.

steps.description: Select an existing task from the task list or kanban board.
Modify title, priority, toggle completion, and update recurrence pattern.
Save changes.
Validate that all updated task attributes reflect correctly and recurrence behavior triggers as expected.

title: Delete Task and Verify Removal
description: Ensure the user can delete a task and that it is removed from all views including Kanban and calendar.

steps.description: Select a task for deletion.
Perform the delete action and confirm any prompts.
Verify the task does not appear in the task list, kanban board, or calendar.

title: Create and Manage Subtasks Under a Parent Task
description: Check that subtasks can be added, edited, and marked complete independently but associated with their parent task.

steps.description: Open an existing parent task.
Add multiple subtasks with distinct titles.
Edit a subtaskâ€™s details.
Mark subtasks complete or incomplete.
Verify subtasks changes persist and parent task task reflects subtask completion status accordingly.

title: Drag and Drop Task in Kanban Board
description: Verify drag-and-drop functionality for tasks across kanban columns for status changes without lag or errors.

steps.description: Navigate to Kanban board.
Drag a task card from one status column to another.
Confirm the task's status updates correctly and the UI reflects the movement instantly.
Perform rapid drag-and-drop of multiple tasks.
Ensure no UI lag, errors, or task data inconsistency appear.

title: Create Calendar Event and Sync to Google Calendar
description: Test creation of a calendar event and verify it synchronizes correctly with Google Calendar, including time blocking.

steps.description: Open calendar view and create a new event with title, time, and description.
Enable Google Calendar synchronization.
Validate that the event appears correctly in both Mind-Sync calendar and the linked Google Calendar.

title: Drag and Drop Event to Reschedule in Calendar
description: Ensure that dragging an event to a new time slot updates the event timing correctly and syncs with Google Calendar.

steps.description: Select an existing calendar event.
Drag the event to a different time block or day.
Confirm event's new time is saved, reflected in the UI, and synchronized with Google Calendar.

title: Handle Google Calendar Sync Conflict Gracefully
description: Test how calendar synchronization deals with conflicts when an event is updated in both Mind-Sync and Google Calendar concurrently.

steps.description: Modify an event's details in Mind-Sync calendar.
Simultaneously modify the same event in Google Calendar.
Verify the app detects conflict and prompts user with resolution options without data loss.

title: Create and Edit Rich-Text Note
description: Verify that users can create new notes, format text richly (bold, italic, lists), and save the note correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Notes and create a new note.
Use rich-text editor to add various formats (headings, bold text, bullet points).
Save the note.
Ensure note is saved with rich-text formatting intact and persists on reload.

title: Generate AI Summary from Note Content
description: Test ability to generate AI-driven summaries from notes with minimal latency and meaningful content.

steps.description: Create or select a long note with various points.
Trigger AI summary generation.
Verify the summary appears quickly, accurately representing the main points of the note.

title: Activate Focus Mode and Use Pomodoro Timer
description: Confirm that Focus Mode timer starts, counts down correctly, and emits expected notifications or alerts at session end.

steps.description: Navigate to Focus Mode screen.
Start the Pomodoro timer.
Check that timer counts down from preset duration correctly without interruption.
Confirm notification or alert appears when timer completes.

title: Play and Control Ambient Soundscapes During Focus Mode
description: Verify that ambient soundscapes play continuously during Focus Mode and can be paused or switched without disrupting timer.

steps.description: Start Focus Mode with Pomodoro timer.
Play ambient soundscape.
Switch between different soundscapes and pause/play the audio.
Confirm soundscape changes take effect immediately and the timer continues without disruption.

title: View Analytics Dashboard and Verify Data Accuracy
description: Check that productivity insights (heatmaps, weekly charts) load properly and reflect correct data from user activities.

steps.description: Navigate to Analytics Dashboard.
Verify heatmaps and charts display data consistent with tasks completed, focus sessions, and calendar events.
Confirm that dashboard loads efficiently on desktop and mobile devices.

title: Meeting Mode: Real-Time Transcription Accuracy and UI Feedback
description: Ensure that meeting transcription updates in real-time with minimal latency and user interface reflects transcription status clearly.

steps.description: Start Meeting Mode.
Speak or provide audio input for transcription.
Verify transcript is displayed in near real-time and matches spoken words accurately.
Confirm UI shows transcription progress or status (e.g., loading indicator).

title: Meeting Mode: Generate AI Meeting Minutes and Action Items
description: Validate that AI generates concise meeting summaries and actionable items from the transcription accurately.

steps.description: Conduct a meeting session with multiple topics spoken.
Trigger AI to generate minutes and action items.
Ensure the minutes and action items are contextually correct and relevant to the discussions captured.

title: Meeting Mode: Audio Visualizer Functionality
description: Check that the audio visualizer responds dynamically to audio input during meetings and renders correctly without crashes.

steps.description: Start meeting mode with audio input.
Confirm audio visualizer animates responsively to audio levels.
Stop audio input.
Verify that visualizer stops or reflects silence state gracefully.

title: AI Smart Suggestions for Scheduling Optimization
description: Verify that the AI suggests optimal scheduling times for tasks based on calendar availability and priorities.

steps.description: Create a task without a scheduled time.
Request AI scheduling suggestions.
Validate that suggestions are reasonable, conflicts are avoided, and priorities are considered.

title: Data Persistence and Recovery After Unexpected Reload
description: Ensure that all tasks, notes, calendar events, and focus mode states persist correctly after browser reload or crash.

steps.description: Create or edit tasks, notes, and calendar events.
Start focus mode timer.
Reload the browser unexpectedly.
Verify all data remains consistent and the focus timer state is restored or reset gracefully.

title: Error Handling on Failed AI Summary Generation
description: Test system behavior and user feedback when AI summary generation fails due to server error or timeout.

steps.description: Simulate AI backend failure or timeout when requesting summary.
Verify that the UI provides a clear error message and allows retrying the operation.
